Name: Hero Index
About the game: Hero Index is a VR Power Suit Action game designed for Valve Index Controller. BE THE SUPER HERO! As the elite soldier wearing the hi-tech robotic armor H.E.R.O ( Humanoid Exo Robotic Outfit ) , you will be on missions of various situations (destroy a small enemy fleet, escort ally ship to escape point, etc...). Take off from your own battleship, approach enemy's battleship from any angle you want. Wipe out all enemies with your deadly arsenals. SIGNATURE WEAPONS INDEX LASER : Laser beam emitted from index finger FIST CANNON : Rapid fire triggered by holding your fist LIGHTNING : Electric arcs that will hit multi targets automatically ULTRA BEAM : Long range palm laser. Warship killer BATTLESHIP SUPPORT You are not fighting alone. Your battleship and fighter squadrons fight alongside you. WHY INDEX CONTROLLER? Hero Index delivers the superhero-like flying experience that everyone has dreamed of. Thanks to the innovative finger tracking of Index Controller, gesture-based fly and weapon control that was impossible with traditional motion controller becomes true for the first time. As a game completely designed for Valve Index, Hero Index aggressively adopts finger gesture control without compromise. Take the most iconic weapon, the index laser, as an example, for the first time in video game history, players can aim actually with their own index fingers and fire at will without pressing any button . CAN I PLAY IT WITHOUT INDEX CONTROLLER? Sort of. With the latest 'Escort' update, Vive Wand and Oculus Touch users can do fly control and use limited weapons now. It is still experimental feature so might have issues. FEATURES Control your fly direction and speed preciously with hand and finger motion. No button is involved. Fire your weapon by open your hand, hold your fist, or point with your index finger. Do the right gesture, the right weapon fired, weapon switching can't be more seamless. Again, no button is involved. Breathtaking epic space battle experience tailored for the unique control mechanics.
